thread.title: Looking for backpackers for Ladakh tour August 2015
thread.title_full: Looking for backpackers for Ladakh tour August 2015

author: solitary soul
title: Looking for backpackers for Ladakh tour August 2015
text: India Mike » India Travel » India Travel Basics » India Travel Partners » Looking for backpackers for Ladakh tour August 2015 Looking for backpackers for Ladakh tour August 2015 # 1 Hello fellow travelers , We 3 people are going for ladakh this august. there is bascialy no plan , thats how backpacking should be done. the blue print is we are leaving delhi on 25th aug to manali n have to reach srinagar by 3 september. It will be all roads trip an a very budget trip as our expenses is limited to 15k per person. So if anyone is willing to join us , the transport costs can get reduced then !! advice on cheap accomodations , lodging are welcome!! mission - complete all tiger reserve travel by 2020
